title: Giant Zombie Beast
description: Experiment Undead Zombie Beast Game Ready, Animated, Maya Rig
longDescription:
Welcome to the realm of undead mayhem with the Zombie Giant Animated Character!


Prepare to unleash the terror with our animated zombie giant character, equipped with a range of animations, formidable weapons, and spine-chilling sounds.


This colossal creature is meticulously rigged in Maya, with the Maya rig included for seamless customization. While it doesn't adhere to the Epic Skeleton, fear not! Its humanoid form ensures effortless retargeting using Unreal IK retargeter.

For those eager to expand their horizons, the package features a fully functional 2023 Maya rig, empowering you to craft a myriad of captivating animations.


Dive into the depths of dread with a versatile array of animations, including:

  • Attack
  • Walk
  • Attack With Weapon
  • Defend/Block
  • Defend With Weapon
  • Die
  • Dead
  • Hurt
  • Idle


But that's not all! Test your mettle with an arsenal of basic weapons perfectly suited for animating:

  • Two-handed mace
  • Morgenstern
  • Long sword
  • Battle axe


Need guidance navigating this dark terrain? Look no further than our comprehensive video manual/demonstration, accessible here: https://youtu.be/dF8xdVLItbo


For any inquiries or assistance, don't hesitate to reach out to us at kornica3d(at)gmail(dot)com. Embrace the darkness and bring your nightmares to life!


And as a bonus, enjoy the convenience of our master customizable material shared among all weapons and the creature, ensuring seamless integration and customization.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Â Skeletal mesh with Materials and Textures
  • 8 Animations + Lying Dead Pose/Anim
  • 5 Unique sounds and Growls
  • 1 AI art image if you want to use it in your project
  • Maya Rig Project if you want to add more animations


Rigged: Maya Rig Included

Rigged to Epic skeleton: No

Animated: Yes

Number of Animations: 8 + 1 (Dead Pose)

Animation type: In-Place

Number of characters: 1

Number of weapons: 4

Number of sounds: 5


Vertex counts of character: 8391


Vertex counts of weapons:

  • Battle Axe: 547
  • Long Sword: 617
  • Mace: 226
  • Morgenstern: 1374


Number of Materials and Material Instances: 1 Master, 5 Instances

Number of Textures: 21 ( 5 Images, 16 Actual Textures)

Texture Resolutions: 2048x2048


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Android: Yes


Documentation: https://youtu.be/dF8xdVLItbo

Important/Additional Notes: For more information visit my website: https://kornica3d.click

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Moved assets to their respective folders and disabled plugins
